pageTitle: Rag & Bone/JEAN The Halifax Legging Jeans | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Leg opening: 10in / 25cm Inseam: 28in / 71cm Rise: 8in / 20cm MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Leather clean. Trim: 100% lambskin. Body: 98% cotton/2% polyurethane. Fabric: Stretch denim. Leather panels and moto-inspired stitching lend a modern edge to sexy legging jeans. Topstitching on the back pockets completes the look. 5-pocket styling. Single-button closure and zip fly. Description Rag & Bone/JEAN > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Launched in spring 2010, Rag & Bone's companion line Rag & Bone/JEAN features a collection of denim, knits, and shirts reflective of the brand's core ethos: expertly constructed clothing made from luxury fabrics with a keen attention to fit. Designers Marcus Wainwright and David Neville have crafted classic jeans in their purest form and function, menswear button-downs that are indisputably feminine, and quintessential sweaters for the modern girl. These styles are clean, effortless, and indispensible. See all Rag & Bone/JEAN reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
